properties.description: Comprehensive governance policy set aligned with Azure Cloud Adoption Framework's five governance disciplines: Cost Management, Security Baseline, Identity Baseline, Resource Consistency, and Deployment Acceleration.

policyDefinitionGroups.name: CostManagement
policyDefinitionGroups.description: Policies to control and optimize spending. Without cost governance, organizations overspend by 200-400% in their first quarter.

policyDefinitionGroups.name: SecurityBaseline
policyDefinitionGroups.description: Security policies and controls. Security retrofits cost 10x more than building it correctly from the start.

policyDefinitionGroups.name: IdentityBaseline
policyDefinitionGroups.description: Managing identities and access through RBAC and least privilege principles.

policyDefinitionGroups.name: ResourceConsistency
policyDefinitionGroups.description: Uniform organization through naming conventions and tagging strategies.

policyDefinitionGroups.name: DeploymentAcceleration
policyDefinitionGroups.description: Automating deployments through Infrastructure as Code and CI/CD pipelines.
